bug.author: kashrish
bug.description: I am using airsim with city environment . When I am trying to reset to inital state using client.reset(), after say 20 sec or more , it does not work .

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kashrish>@kashrish</denchmark-link> There have been major fixes to the reset() functionality over the last year. Any chance your issue is resolved? Let us know.

Closed due to age and incompleteness. Please feel free to open a new issue if you still have this problem, and include the following (as requested when opening a bug issue) *Make sure to write all reproduction steps *Include full error message in text form *Search issues for error message before filing issue *Attach screenshot if applicable *Include code to run if applicable Thanks!
